title: Media Library
desc: A CRUD application used to store entries about a users media library/collection (i.e, books, movies, music). Made with React, Tailwind and localStorage.

title: Restaurant Menu
desc: A Restaurant menu application made with NextJS, the dish data is stored in JSON and can be conditionally rendered using react components.

title: Weather app
desc: This project uses a React.js page and calls the Weather API to display the current weather for a given location.

title: Google Clone
desc: This was one of my first projects where I practiced my CSS skills by replicating a responsive page.

title: Mint Sign-up Clone
desc: Another vanilla CSS replication project - a sign up form for creating a new account.

title: To do list with MongoDB back-end
desc: To do list app from 'The Complete 2023 Web Development Bootcamp', database is hosted using MongoDB Atlas and the Express.js app on Cyclic

title: Hotel Room Review Full-Stack
desc: This is the first full-stack project I have taken on. This project taught me how to efficiently configure routes and APIs, as well as using asynchronous functions to retrieve data to the user. Users can login (using their Google account, or any potential provider) to post reviews, where they can be liked by other users, these reviews can also be deleted or edited through the author's dashboard. Hosted on Vercel.

title: This portfolio
desc: This portfolio was made using Next.js and SASS, I plan to update this portfolio as I go through my web development journey.
